com.communote.server.api.core.note.processor

Interface NoteStoringPreProcessorManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoteStoringPreProcessorManagerImpl

    public interface NoteStoringPreProcessorManager
    Extension point for registering processors to manipulate notes before they are persisted. Typical use cases cover the extraction of meta data from the text and cleaning the DOM of content so that only supported tags and attributes are kept. This extension point respects the order value of the registered processors when calling them. Those with a higher order value will be called first.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • process

        void process(NoteStoringTO noteStoringTO)
      throws NoteStoringPreProcessorException,
             NoteManagementAuthorizationException
        Run the registered preprocessors. This will at first invoke the NoteStoringEditableContentPreProcessors and afterwards the NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessors.
        Parameters:
        noteStoringTO - the TO to pass to the preprocessors
        Throws:
        NoteStoringPreProcessorException - in case any of the preprocessors failed
        NoteManagementAuthorizationException - thrown to indicate that the note cannot be created because of access restrictions

      • addProcessor

        void addProcessor(NoteStoringEditableContentPreProcessor notePreProcessor)
        Add the given preprocessor to the list of processors.
        Parameters:
        notePreProcessor - the preprocessor to add

      • addProcessor

        void addProcessor(NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessor notePreProcessor)
        Add the given preprocessor to the list of processors.
        Parameters:
        notePreProcessor - the preprocessor to add

      • removeProcessor

        void removeProcessor(NoteStoringEditableContentPreProcessor notePreProcessor)
        Remove the given preprocessor from the list of processors.
        Parameters:
        notePreProcessor - The processor.

      • removeProcessor

        void removeProcessor(NoteStoringImmutableContentPreProcessor notePreProcessor)
        Remove the given preprocessor from the list of processors.
        Parameters:
        notePreProcessor - The processor.
